name: Christmas Reindeer Costume
description: As long as you dress like this, you can blend in the Santa's snow cart to steal some gifts haha!

name: Christmas Reindeer Horn
description: A huge and awesome reindeer horn, it can hang so many decorations.....

name: Christmas Socks
description: Broken red sock with holes. What kind of presents did it decorate before?

name: Christmas Song
description: Jingle Bell~Jingle Bell~Jingle all the way! The meaningful happiness Christmas Tree is forever surrounded by the Christmas Song.
effect: Movement Spd ＋2%,Auto attack has 30% chance to trigger Christmas Song: Atk ＋3%, Attack Spd ＋3%, for 10 Sec.

name: Christmas Song Blueprint
description: Jingle Bell~Jingle Bell~Jingle all the way! The meaningful happiness Christmas Tree is forever surrounded by the Christmas Song.

name: Christmas Sweet Chest
description: A loving Christmas Chest. Open it to receive a mysterious gift.

name: Christmas Sweet Chest (excluded)
description: A loving Christmas Chest. Open it to receive a mysterious gift.

name: Christmas Sweet Chest (excluded)
description: A loving Christmas Chest. Open it to receive a mysterious gift.

name: Christmas Tree Bell
description: After helping Santa drive off the wizard Bijou, the reward given by Santa Claus symbolizes the small bells of Gingerbread City.

name: Christmas Village Chest
description: Open the box and you will get a number of Colorful Shells as well as an item randomly selected among Fang of Garm, Ice Powder, Time Twister, Key of Clock Tower, Christmas Garland, Christmas Socks, Pet EXP Potion (S), Pet EXP Potion (M) and Pet EXP Potion (L).

name: Christmas Warm Chest
description: This package can bring you some warmth in cold winter

name: Chrono Chest
description: Open to gain MVP materials from areas on Clock Tower difficulty and below

name: Cigarette
description: Smoking is harmful to the health of the human body, and the juveniles are prohibited from smoking.

name: Cigarette Blueprint
description: Smoking is harmful to the health of the human body, and the juveniles are prohibited from smoking.

name: Circus Baphomet
description: An otherworldly fashion Coloring Agent that adventurers can find from Moonlight Monsters. It can be used on Mandragora.
